title: Tranquillity in the Himalayas, Dharamshala with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Relax and rejuvenate with two nights of mountaintop tranquillity at Rakkh Resort in the Himalayas, Dharamshala. Includes all meals (daily breakfast, lunch and dinner), one 30-minute spa treatment each, a paragliding discount so you can soar over the enchanting landscape, plus multiple complimentary outdoor activities and cultural experiences.
offer_address: Ghamrota Village Post Office Ballah ,Tehsil Palampur, District Kangra, Jiun, Himachal Pradesh 176061, India

title: Five-Star Radisson Himalaya Escape with Daily Breakfast & Dining Discount
description: Enjoy a rejuvenating nature escape at the five-star Radisson Blu Resort Dharamshala, a heavenly resort resting amidst the Dhauladhar ranges and listed as one of the top-rated resorts in Dharamshala on Tripadvisor. Disconnect, rejuvenate and revitalise yourself with the clean mountain air while experiencing contemporary luxury and exceptional hospitality at this Radisson property. Trek through the mountains to one of the many monasteries and temples or head to McLeod Ganj to visit the home of his Holiness the Dalai Lama. Back at the resort, take a dip in the infinity pool, dine at the in-house restaurant, The Edge, or relax with a drink at All Out Bar & Lounge, which serves some of the best Indian liquor. The resort is just a 30-minute drive from Kangra Airport, or around a 10-hour drive from Delhi.
offer_address: Village Kandi PO, Khanyara Rd, Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh 176215

title: Secluded Himachal Mountain Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Perched on a hilltop with the magnificent Dhauladhar mountains of Himachal Pradesh as a backdrop, Rakkh Resort is a unique retreat perfect for city-weary souls. Set on 4.5 acres of rolling green hills, this paradise perfectly combines adventurous experiences and transformative living and is situated close to the popular destinations of McLeod Ganj and Dharamshala, making it easy to experience the best of the region.
offer_address: Ghamrota Village Post Office Ballah, Tehsil Palampur, District Kangra, Jiun, Himachal Pradesh 176061

title: Grand Opening: Five-Star Radisson Himalaya Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Three-Course Dinner
description:
Enjoy a rejuvenating nature escape at the five-star Radisson Blu Resort Dharamshala, a newly opened resort nestled in the Dhauladhar ranges and already listed as one of the top-rated resorts in Dharamshala on Tripadvisor.

Disconnect, rejuvenate and revitalise yourself with the clean mountain air while experiencing contemporary luxury and exceptional hospitality at this brand-new retreat. Trek through the mountains to one of the many monasteries and temples or head to McLeod Ganj to visit the home of his Holiness the Dalai Lama. Back at the resort, take a dip in the infinity pool, dine at the in-house restaurant, The Edge, or relax with a drink at All Out Bar & Lounge, which serves some of the best Indian liquor. The resort is just a 30-minute drive from Kangra Airport, a scenic half-day drive from Punjab or around a 10-hour drive from New Delhi.
offer_address: Village Kandi PO, Khanyara Rd, Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh 176215

title: Grand Opening: Relaxing Dharamshala Stay with Daily Breakfast
description:
Happiness is within easy reach at jÜSTa Birding Dharamshala, a beautiful resort perched on a hill in the heart of Dharamshala. Situated in the shadow of the snow-capped Dhauladhar ranges and offering panoramic views of the popular hill town, this gorgeous resort invites you to disconnect with reality and rejuvenate from within.

Wandering souls are bound to find a welcome refuge from the hurly-burly of city life in this new resort, situated close to the home of His Holiness the Dalai Lama. Easily accessible from Kangra Airport (less than an hour's drive) and major cities like Delhi, jÜSTa Birding Dharamshala will put you in close proximity to the region's popular adventurous experiences. And as a bonus, you can spot some of the most exotic birds right from this hillside paradise.
offer_address: Khanyara Road, Chohla, Tahu, Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh 176215

title: Boutique Himalayas Retreat with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Enjoy a refreshing break at Rakkh Resort, a scenic spot nestled in the lap of the majestic Dhauladhar Mountains in the Himalayas. Situated close to the popular tourist attractions of McLeod Ganj and Dharamshala, Rakkh Resort offers a unique stay with no TVs, minibars or room service, motivating you to spend quality time with your loved ones.

Includes all meals (daily breakfast, lunch and dinner), one 30-minute spa treatment per adult, a paragliding discount so you can soar over the enchanting landscape, plus multiple complimentary outdoor activities and cultural experiences.
offer_address: Ghamrota Village Post Office Ballah ,Tehsil Palampur, District Kangra, Jiun, Himachal Pradesh
